start_boss.text: That thing is an overgrown piece of shit.
Ha, I think they are compensating for something.
I don't know how they acquired something like that, but I am going to blow it the fuck up!

retreat.text: You didn't think it would be that easy, did you?
Fuck this, I'm out of here.

out_of_missiles.text: Goddammit, spent all my missiles already?!

engaged.text: You think you can fuck with me?!

need_help.text: Hey assholes, I need some help over here right now!
I am going to die over here if you fuckers don't bail me out!

pursuing.text: Get over here you little shit!
Hold still and let me kill you!

running.text: Shit, I am in too deep!
Catch me if you can assholes!

hull_90.text: My God damn paint got scratched!

hull_50.text: This piece of shit can't take it!
You assholes will pay for that!

hull_30.text: You've done it now, you assholes!

overload.text: When this ship comes back online, I'll kick your ass!

death.text: You have to be kidding me!

victory.text: I think we are done here.
Look at the bitches scatter into the wind.
